changeSet.author: vpiyanov
changeSet.comment: Create new User Account for DSL
changeSet.sql: insert into user (DTYPE, email, deleted, locked) values ('SecureUser', 'dsluser@natera.com', 0, 0); insert into user_roles (user_id, roles_element) select id, "ROLE_LIMS_USER" as role from user where email='dsluser@natera.com';
changeSet.rollback: delete from user_roles where user_id=(select id from user where email='dsluser@natera.com'); delete from user where email = 'dsluser@natera.com';
